title: Turok 2 Seeds of Evil playthrough -- Part 1
description: Turok 2 Enhanced Edition came out today! I played through the first one back when that came out and loved it, so I was really excited for this. I get really lost in this so I apologize for that, but whatever, still enjoying the game a lot.

you don't want to APPEAR to hold their hand, but you also want to do exactly that
